PageTitle: multicast bas-policy out enable interface gigabitethernet
FuncDef:
The multicast bas-policy out enable interface gigabitethernet command enables user-side multicast CAC on a specific interface board.
The undo multicast bas-policy out enable interface gigabitethernet command disables user-side multicast CAC on a specific interface board.
By default, user-side multicast CAC is disabled on an interface board.
CLIs: multicast bas-policy out enable interface gigabitethernet
undo multicast bas-policy out enable interface gigabitethernet
Examples: [*HUAWEI-slot-1] multicast bas-policy out enable interface GigabitEthernet
[*HUAWEI-GigabitEthernet2/0/0] multicast bas-policy policy1 out bandwidth 10000 level-1 8000
[*HUAWEI-domain-huawei] multicast bas-policy policy1 out bandwidth 10000 level-1 8000 interface GigabitEthernet
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After user-side multicast CAC is configured in the system view, run the multicast bas-policy out enable command to enable user-side multicast CAC on the target interface board.
Precautions
This command must be used together with the multicast bas-policy out bandwidth level-1 interface GigabitEthernet command in the AAA domain view or the multicast bas-policy out bandwidth level-1 command in the physical interface view.
The multicast bas-policy out enable command can be run either before or after the preceding command in the AAA domain or physical interface view.
The multicast bas-policy out enable command configuration is effective only for GE interfaces on the interface board.
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
